lead_paragraph: Paris St Germain defender Serge Aurier will be tried in September over a brush with police after the football player left a night club shortly before dawn on Monday, the public prosecutor's office said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: PSG's Aurier Sent to Court Over Fracas With Police
headline.main: PSG's Aurier Sent to Court Over Fracas With Police
